title: Presidents' Day deals at Amazon: TVs, Fire tablets, Kindle, Blink Mini, and more
author: mackenzie-frazier
summary: See our top picks from the Amazon Presidents' Day sale
article: The 2021 Presidents' Day sales event is officially underway, and Amazon is celebrating this year with fantastic deals on its best-selling devices. We're rounding up our top picks from Amazon's Presidents' Day sale below, which include up to $100 in savings on Fire tablets, Kindle e-readers, 4K TVs with the Fire Edition built-in, Blink Security cameras, and so much more.

Amazon's top Presidents' Day deals include the Fire HD 10 tablet on sale for $94.99 (was $149.99), the Kindle Paperwhite marked down to $94.99 (was $129.99), and a massive $30 discount on the Echo Show 5. If you're looking for TV deals, Amazon has this Insignia 50-inch 4K Fire TV on sale for $299.99 and a $100 discount on the 65-inch model bringing the price down to $449.99. Shop more of Amazon's top Presidents' Day deals below and keep in mind, most Presidents' Day sales end today, so you should take advantage now before it's too late.

See more TV offers with our roundup of the best Presidents' Day TV sales and the best Presidents' Day laptop sales. You can also shop for more bargains with our roundup of the best Home Depot Presidents' Day sales and the Walmart Presidents' Day sale.
